title: Neural Network Visualizer
description: Interactive tool for visualizing and interacting with logic gate neural networks, enhancing transparency in AI decision-making.
image-alt: Animated magnifying glass examining neural network nodes and connections

title: EcoLogic
description: Implemented Differentiable Logic Gate Networks on FPGAs for increased inference speeds and reduction in power consumption.
image-alt: EcoLogic project logo featuring green circuit board design with leaf motif representing eco-friendly AI

title: DinoJourney
description: Mobile mental health companion app that pairs users with a supportive dinosaur pet, promoting well-being without guilt.
image-alt: DinoJourney logo showing a friendly cartoon dinosaur companion for mental health support

title: SaliencySlider
description: Web application that allows users to upload images and explore how a CNN classifies images based on specific regions, using a saliency slider for feature visibility.
image-alt: Saliency map visualization showing highlighted regions that CNN focuses on during image classification

title: ASA DataFest
description: Data analysis presentation using CourseKata data for the University of Florida's largest annual Data Science competition. Awarded best overall project.
image-alt: Data visualization worm chart showing CourseKata learning patterns analysis from DataFest competition

title: DinoDetect
description: Discord bot that uses sentiment analysis to detect cheating, sentiment, and toxicity in server communications.
image-alt: DinoDetect logo featuring dinosaur mascot for Discord bot sentiment analysis tool

title: AdapTree
description: AI-powered educational platform that creates personalized learning pathways based on user's background. Finalist at 2023 AI Days Hackathon.
image-alt: AdapTree logo showing tree structure representing personalized adaptive learning pathways

title: Regressive Reasoning
description: A machine learning project focused on classifying brand logos with a 95% validation accuracy, utilizing TensorFlow and EfficientNet on UF's HiPerGator supercomputer.
image-alt: Regressive Reasoning project logo for brand logo classification machine learning system

title: Neuronal Analysis
description: Leading gene analysis of house mouse in R, using machine learning algorithms to decode neuronal network patterns from RNA-seq datasets.
image-alt: Scientific illustration of Mus musculus house mouse used for neuronal gene analysis research

title: Budget Buddy
description: Flutter-based app developed to assist in financial planning, featuring dynamic graphs and sorting algorithm analyses for efficient budget management.
image-alt: BudgetBuddy app logo with financial planning and budget tracking graphics

title: Jason's Journey
description: A dungeon crawler Python game inspired by professor Jason Harrington's love for mathematics, developed with Pygame for MAD2502.
image-alt: Jason's Journey game screenshot showing pixel art dungeon crawler with mathematical elements

title: Room Automation
description: A software solution for optimizing room assignments at UF, employing C++ and Qualtrics API to streamline the process for over 200 Resident Assistants.
image-alt: Room Automation system interface for optimizing university housing assignments
